channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 21:29 Air alarm in Cherkasy district to care for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 21:29 Air alarm in Cherkasy district to care for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
